name: Multitask Trainer
description:
Multitask Trainer is a game where you have to move multiple circles to their target locations before time runs out if any of them fail to reach their goal you lose. This can be used to improve multitasking for games like Starcraft 2

How to play:

Right click to move the green circle. You can not click on the minimap to move the green circle. Click 1,2,3,4 to switch cameras.

Goal:

Get the green circle to the goal(circle that changes colour from light blue to red) before time runs out, time is displayed by the colour of the goal once it reaches full red you will lose.
